title: Drawing, "Designs for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975
medium: Black marker and graphite on white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black marker, upper center: Citibank; lower left: CITIBANK.
description: Two logo/logotype designs, one on top of the other. Top logotype is rendered in bold slab-serif font. Below logotype is a black horizontal oval containing a white four-pointed star. Second design contains a bold italic sans-serif logotype with same star-in-oval logo, right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Black marker and graphite on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-40.
